update ACTCON_BL_AUDIT_TRN set STR_GRANT_TYPE_CODE=?,STR_MAJOR_HEAD_CODE=?,STR_SUB_MAJOR_HEAD_CODE=?,STR_MINOR_HEAD_CODE=?,STR_SUB_MINOR_HEAD_CODE=?,STR_TO_GRANT_TYPE_CODE=?,STR_TO_MAJOR_HEAD_CODE=?,STR_TO_SUB_MAJOR_HEAD_CODE=?,STR_TO_MINOR_HEAD_CODE=?,STR_TO_SUB_MINOR_HEAD_CODE=?,STR_BILL_AUDITING_REMARKS=? where STR_REQ_APP_NO=? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
